amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds for the Institute for Seafood Studies project of the Nicholls State University Department of Biological Sciences, Thibodaux, Louisiana, and to decrease the appropriations for the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration operations, research, and facilities by $325,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 84 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds for the Institute for Seafood Studies project of the Nicholls State University Department of Biological Sciences, Thibodaux, Louisiana, and decrease the appropriations for the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration operations, research, and facilities by $325,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A032) Failed by recorded vote: 124 - 303 (Roll no. 382).
